description: Allows you to purchase a reserved cache node offering. Reserved nodes are not eligible for cancellation and are non-refundable. For more information, see Managing Costs with Reserved Nodes.

parameters.name: ReservedCacheNodesOfferingId
parameters.description: The ID of the reserved cache node offering to purchase. Example: 438012d3-4052-4cc7-b2e3-8d3372e0e706

parameters.name: ReservedCacheNodeId
parameters.description: A customer-specified identifier to track this reservation. Example: myreservationID.

parameters.name: CacheNodeCount
parameters.description: The number of cache node instances to reserve. Default: 1

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A list of tags to be added to this resource. A tag is a key-value pair. A tag key must be accompanied by a tag value, although null is accepted. (dict) --- A tag that can be added to an ElastiCache cluster or replication group. Tags are composed of a Key/Value pair. You can use tags to categorize and track all your ElastiCache resources, with the exception of global replication group. When you add or remove tags on replication groups, those actions will be replicated to all nodes in the replication group. A tag with a null Value is permitted. Key (string) --- The key for the tag. May not be null. Value (string) --- The tag's value. May be null.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key for the tag. May not be null.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The tag's value. May be null.

nested_items.name: ReservedCacheNode
nested_items.description: Represents the output of a PurchaseReservedCacheNodesOffering operation.

nested_items.name: ReservedCacheNodeId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the reservation.

nested_items.name: CacheNodeType
nested_items.description: The cache node type for the reserved cache nodes.

nested_items.name: M7g node types
nested_items.type: not recommended. Existing clusters are still supported but creation of new clusters is not supported for these types.

nested_items.name: C1 node types:
nested_items.type: not recommended. Existing clusters are still supported but creation of new clusters is not supported for these types.

nested_items.name: C1 node types:
nested_items.type: not recommended. Existing clusters are still supported but creation of new clusters is not supported for these types.

nested_items.name: R7g node types
nested_items.type: not recommended. Existing clusters are still supported but creation of new clusters is not supported for these types.

nested_items.name: Duration
nested_items.description: The duration of the reservation in seconds.

nested_items.name: FixedPrice
nested_items.description: The fixed price charged for this reserved cache node.

nested_items.name: UsagePrice
nested_items.description: The hourly price charged for this reserved cache node.

nested_items.name: CacheNodeCount
nested_items.description: The number of cache nodes that have been reserved.

nested_items.name: ProductDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the reserved cache node.

nested_items.name: OfferingType
nested_items.description: The offering type of this reserved cache node.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the reserved cache node.

nested_items.name: RecurringCharges
nested_items.description: The recurring price charged to run this reserved cache node.

nested_items.name: RecurringChargeAmount
nested_items.description: The monetary amount of the recurring charge.

nested_items.name: RecurringChargeFrequency
nested_items.description: The frequency of the recurring charge.

nested_items.name: ReservationARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the reserved cache node.
